Text:
You deserve more than a simple 'Thank you'...

I love you.

YIFY

Wrong title, it should say DEMASTERED, since only your recodes completely misrepresent the whole idea of "high-definition".

It would be far better to recode at an intermediate resolution with the same bitrate (which would give a far better perceptual quality), and keep the surround-sound using AAC for compression (and not lower the bitrate and frequency resolution).

Instead you load these shit-amateur crap rips and clutter the hell out of the HD movie category, to which your uploads most definitely DO NOT BELONG.

In closing, I hope a giant outer space shit asteroid lands on you, ending your reign of crapitude on this otherwise most exemplary website. Good day.

Whatever dildo! Yify's rips are pretty good most the time! I think you need to stop being such a nerdy bitch and quit trying to use sophisticated big words to make yourself look smart! Realize this man...... Nobody gives a shit what you think! Yify has dominated this site for a good reason... Simply cause he has selection, good file sizes and he's trusted. Hence the green skull! I dont see yours!!! In other words people dont listen to this Pirate Bay troll! He is a tool and most likely comes from a long line of other trolls!
